metadata.title: CVE-2014-4678 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The safe_eval function in Ansible before 1.6.4 does not properly restrictthe code subset, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary codevia crafted instructions. NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of anincomplete fix for CVE-2014-4657.

criterions.comment: ansible: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
